column2: a hella weekend, actually, with much more drama than I really needed or required this close to going on the first ever Court Jesters tour. I have the feeling the drama has just started, too. Probably just as well I will be on the road/out of the country.
>So, yesterday, yeah? Big Anniversary party for MDL Communications. 46th

Mother was there, of course, as were Caro and Teague, the CJ PA Ian and his boy-o, Uncle Eddie and his wife, plus a large assortment of employees, including Becky and Simon Fucking Cooper. Even the Pirates put in an appearance.

column1: event,"Simon Fucking Cooper used the annual MDL Anniversary party to serve Becks w/ divorce papers. In public. Because he's an asshole and didn't get the promotion he thought he deserved and because Becks never provided him with an heir. Needless to say, Father handed him his arse on a plate (with a minimal severance package, probably  more than he deserved).
It gets real interesting 'cause Becks wants a pity party today (sunday) and wants Colleen there. And that's awkward since I'm about to go on a 6 week tour of the UK and US as boyish me.

Still, I see Simon Fucking Cooper again, and I'm deep-frying his balls while he's still attached to them. You don't DO THAT to yer wife of nearly 10 years, not in public, and not at a company function."

event,"Oh, I have been so schtum on things on my usual social media sources (twitter, Facebook page, official blog) it isn't funny. But, since this journal is fairly locked down, I can indulge in a bit of whinging.

It should be obvious: I desperately want to be the next Doctor. Given my rather advanced age (43 next month), this regeneration will probably be my last, best hope. I have known for several years that the Moff doesn't think much of me-- oh, he hasn't said as much to my face, but The Geek made it clear, once HE got hired as the Official Music Man of the show. Yes, I've been an obnoxious fuck in the past-- but I've gotten better. Honestly! Since the announcement of Matt Smith as the Doctor, I have been nothing but discrete. Even our CJ musical parody of DW met w/ Moff's approval (I let the Geek handle that one of course.) I've been nothing but the soul of discretion.
Still, I can't help but wonder....
a) am I too well-known? I mean, really, not a BIG name, but still, people know who I am.
b) The whole Shardnay/Merlow etc. thing might be a hindrance-- not exactly family-friendly, you know?
c) Could my personal life-- specifically the big fuck-up 10 years ago (FUCK! TEN YEARS AGO!)-- keep me from being cast?

Needless to say, am totally playing by the rules. I used my new casting agent (who I retained some 6 months ago, thank you) to submit CV, reel, etc. I have said absolutely nothing in social media, didn't even acknowledge that my odds are 25/1 (same as Euuuuuuuuuu's!) I'm praying (well, not exactly, but begging whatever powers are in charge) that I get to at least audition. I want to be able to show my mad skillz and my Doctor ability off properly, and then be judged on my performance, not my baggage.
If I had known DW would get a reboot, I wouldn't have fucked up so badly 10 yrs ago. No T, no shade."

event,"Swear I'm comin' back here in 2011, even if it's just an rss feed from elsewhere. Had to post this shite, though, 'cause I'm In.A.Mood!To. (Does that even make sense? Thought not.) My precious and her grandparents are stuck in Paris due to all the snow. (Tres Tragique, non?) Am bored. Thus trolling through memories etc.

Get your own Twelve Days:

column1: Five Monkees????? And only three Honeybears? (Unless it's three Honeybears I'm related to genetically, and five Monkees if you count, erm, if you count... Douglis Farthing Hatleid?)

Cut down on my parenting.
Backup my sex regularly.
Drink four glasses of music every day.
Connect with my inner moodyjester.
Overcome my secret fear of x-files.
Get your own New Year's Resolutions:

column1: Totally wrong in some aspects: Why wd I cut down on my parenting? And I don't have a secret fear of the X-Files.
Enough of that. Might as well go back to Plants v. Zombies....."
event,"See, here's more proof positive that David Fucking Tennant wants to be my brother. *rolls eyes* Only Ricky dresses as #5, from what I hear....
David Tennant Has Steamy Sex as Dr Who.""
(And, yanno, I had steamy sex as Julian, Earl of Worth before he even met her. Thing for dressing up, she has.)"
event,"What with all the ""Is he or isn't he leaving"" bruhahahaha going on in the press, it's only right and proper that I cover m' tracks by doing the following:
Vote for Me for the Next Doctor!
Ya know ya want to see me be a Time Lord-- I've been every other sort of Lord the past several years!
event,"It took her LONG enough to dump that ratbag known as K-Fed. Next time, Britney, make like Shardnay and marry yer dog. You'll be much happier!"

event,"I pass really well in drag, yanno. So if yer looking for a female-like person to replace Billie, I could help you out. You've seen The Diva Project, yeah? (If not, I'll have my p.a. send you a disc....)"

event,"Shiloh Nouvel Jolie-Pitt. Riiiiiiight. Named after a fictional dog. (Oh, all right, and some obscure war-between-the-states battle.) Hate to admit this, but Geri's baby's name pwns Bradgilina's.
(And, really, makes my daughter's name seem more and more normal. Wheet!)

In other news, my team (and Mr Swing's, and all right, the rest of the fucking Englanders) totally pwned the Rest of the World in Soccer Aid. Am sore as fuck, but it was worth it. Shelby's fucking proud of her daddy right now!"
event,"Fuck, girl, what are you THINNKING? Saddling your daughter with the name ""Bluebell Madonna""??????? Are you insane??????
(Either that, or I really did fuck yer brains out all those years ago....)"

event,"So, Britney finally copped to being preggers AGAIN. Geezus Fucking Chryst! Bad enough she let KFed put his rod in her once, but twice?????? Euuu. Euuuu. Euuuu. Even Shardnay wd have better taste!!!!!"

event,"So, yeah, happy *mumble*th birthday to that most devestatingly magnificant of new mothers, <lj user=""digital_devi"">! I trust m'brother managed to give you a v. special day indeed! (I knew of some of the plans, but only in a vague, conceptual way.)
<small>And as always, am guilt-tripping for the far less cordial birthday lj entry of 3 yrs ago. But, it all comes down to ME, yanno!</small>
Anywho, hope yer day was fucking brilliant!"
event,"So. No BAFTA nom for me. Bugger.
Good news, though, is that neither Chris Eccles nor David Fucking Tennant were nominated, either. WHEET! About fucking time.
Bad news: What's with all the Bleak House noms? Thought it pants, m'self, wot I saw of it. Esp. Gillian Anderson."
event,"<table width=350 align=center border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=2><tr><td bgcolor=""#E6F3E5"" align=center><font face=""Georgia, Times New Roman, Times, serif"" style='color:black
You're very Irish, and most likely from Ireland.

(And if you're not, you should be!)
How Irish Are You?
(It's having had a tan multiple times in m' life and no longer havin' a pint fer brekky wot kept the percentage down.)"
event,"If I had known that all I had to do to score a guest role in the New Who was to write a sycophantic letter to RTD, I would have done it the weekend ""Rose"" leaked. Fucking Peter Kay.
(And really, am fraking amused that the more publicity photos I see of DT as D10, the more he looks like he's ripping off The Geek in looks. W-A-N-K-E-R.)
(Oops, don't think that will endear me any to RTD et al. Not surprised.)"

event,"So, yeah, saw Maddy-san's latest vid. Ugh. Where ""Hung Up"" was 17 kinds of sex, ""Sorry"" was just cheese. And we're talking the shite that squirts out of a can. *shakes head* Ah, Madge, ya can do better. (Props for more of her in the vid than the Obligatory Gangstas, this time.)

Still, am psyched, because the CJ spoof (featuring Auntie S) is totally awesome. We've even gotten Mrs Geek to direct, quite a feat considering her size and attitude. (For her sake, hope she spawns early, because, jeez, she's had enough already!)"

event,"Actually, thanks gobs to those of you who might have influenced the New Woman poll of the 100 Sexiest Men. Overall, am quite content to have been voted #42. Yeah, yeah, yeah, both my best buds ranked higher (Mr Swing at #13 and Ewwwwwww at #37), and I didn't score as well as Prince William (#25) or David Fucking Tennant (#20, the bastard)-- but, still, I was in the top half of the list, and I ranked higher than Sir Mick (#67), Dan Radcliffe (#86), and the Geek (#99.)
(To tell the truth, though, the Geek is fucking embarrassed to be on the list, 'cause he works v. hard not to be sexy unless it's for Mrs Geek.)"
event,"So, yeah, thanks for making me #5 for Most Desirable Person on telly. Is great honour to be the highest-rated ITV type in the shaggable catagory.

Am trying not to be hacked off by spaces 1-4 taken by Doctor Who types. (Cause, yeah, had #1, would do #2 if had the opp, poss wd do #3, and wd have had #4 already if he weren't in a committed relationship.)
Thanks also for making The Foundling #7 in Best Drama. Also, one of the highest rated ITV sort of things. Yeah baby!
Personal goal for next yr: Beating out DW types, just for revenge about the ""Awww, I wanted to be ginger"" line, if nothing else!"
event,"Am still annoyed by much of TCI sitch, despite our song being in. Thus, snarky comment on the new Doc's fashion ""sense""!"
event,"To quote the Independent quoting The Christmas Invasion: ""In one of his first lines after he has regenerated, changing his appearance, he jokes that he wanted to come back with ginger hair.""
Dude, ginger hair is NOT a joke. Work v. hard to maintain shade, I do. *grumble* suspect it's a dig from RTD about my somewhat-public whinging about who really shd. be the 10th Fucking Doctor."

event,"Finally saw new Moddy-san vid. Oh my fucking Kroll! Totally wet by experience. She's hot-hot-hot, she is! Cannot decide what appeals most-- her strutting around rehearsal space, or her strutting around in leather hoodie, or her humping boom box, or her groovin' on floor at end. Has taken v. gd. care of self, she has. V. gd. indeed. (Down, li'l Colin, down!)

In any case am a sad fuck 'cause despite getting off on experience, find totally want to spoof it. She popped the Court Jester Spoofin' Cherry, she did. Only fair she continues to do us. (Or, rather, we do her.) (Not that either of us have IRL, not for lack of trying on my part.) While Moddy-san herself was hot-hot-hot, she's also fallen into the Trap of The Older Artist. Yanno, once yer a certain age, ya hafta give the most screen time to young, unknown (but rilly ghetto) dancer and poseur types. And Kroll forbid there's like a close-up on the artiste, 'cause ya might see that they're not 20 any longer and therefore can't rilly like make der good choons wot the <strike>brain-dead</strike> wanna get down w/.
(Or something like that-- can't really expect me to keep up w/ U.S. slang, can you, when haven't actually spent more than 3 wks at a time there in wot, nearly 9 yrs?)

Am working on Geek to slip some Moddy-san bashing into schedule. Too wrapped up in the Impending Infant, he is, to react quickly either way. (Is like pulling teeth to get him to focus on the Chrimble vid we're shooting tomorrow.)
Am rambling too much, have to get beauty sleep for tomorrow's filuuuuuuming. Ta ra!"

event,"Nearly late, but usually great. (Hard to get Internet access in Paris, btw. But it's been a hella good par-tay.) Anyway, here's to my father, <lj user=""eppyjr"">, who turns 63 (!!!!!) today. And Shelby says ""Bon anniversaire, papa!"" (and now has broken into giggles)."
event,"'cause I can't be arsed to write about m' real life.
1) Hoo boy, Renee Z has filed for an annulment, claiming ""fraud."" Can't wait to see how that plays out.

2) Preston Michael? Too mormal a name. Britney needs to get a clue re how to name a celebrity baby. (Mon pere is pissed because his name has been invoked. Then again, he's been pissed at the <strike>Pissboy</strike> King of Pop for decades now....)
3) World is coming to end. Janet Fielding's gonna do a Big Finish audio. Tom Baker must be on verge of signing. Geez.
5) No pooftahs, unless I get to be Top."
event,"Well, woo fucking hoo, the wrld has been made safe for humanity, Britney has spawned. Can't wait to hear what lame name she assigns the little prick.
In other news, the following picture has been posted in the interest of public service-- to me!

Note to self: must shave more often if going out in public, w/ current hair. Geek, though, hawt hawt hawt. Hope he's getting some these days, despite condition of Mrs Geek. Wd. do him m'self, but Becky wd object, and besides, don't play the incest game."
event,"Darlings-- I am overwhelmed! Thanks so much for buying out the house last night just to help me celebrate m' birthday! Y'all rock!"
event,"Darlings-- all your well-wishes of the past several days have overwhelmed me. I am grateful for your regard!
(And for those of you who have applied for the position of stepmother-- well!)
Be on the lookout for the following this month:
• The premiere of The Foundling , nearly opposite the final Doctor Who episode of the series.
<li>The continuing gig of the Magill Orchestra, featuring me, Friday and Saturday nights at 8:30 and 11 p.m., at the Blue Orchid.
• The release of the Big Finish Doctor Who audio drama The Sword of the Bard-- featuring me as the baddie-- finally happens mid-month.
• Filming for Regency Buck commences at the end of the month-- check yer usual sources to suss out where you might spot us on location!
And for those of you who keep track, the latest Court Jesters work, a short film and accompanying soundtrack entitled The Diva Declines, has been scheduled for release in late August."

event,"Just a quickie, darlings-- am in Vancouver for custody hearings, and the sitch looks good for at least one Ludlow to be granted permanent custody of my darling Shelby. Thanks for all your good wishes!"

event,"Yo, Regency peeps! If you thought that The Quiet Gentleman kicked serious arse, you will be blown away by Regency Buck. The script sparkles, the cast sparkles, the production sparkles-- and we've only done one read-through of one episode! You will not be disappointed!"
event,"Bless you, darlings, for turning out in such droves for my premiere weekend singin' w/ the band. Online reviews have been good
column2: here's hoping the print journos are as kind demain. Feel free to make coming out to see me a habit!

column1: Will be at the BAFTAs tonight, of course-- think positive thoughts for The Quiet Gentleman, yeah? The petite, cute girl I'll be with is m' bandleader, Chloe.
Oh, and am getting first exposure to the script of Regency Buck tomorrow. Understand we'll be doing the obligatory pre-production group cast shot, as well. Be looking online for it some time soon.
event,"Am extremely fucked off. How dare they cast someone younger than me as the Doctor!!!!! So much for offering to sleep with that producer....
(Oh, all right, the last bit was a joke, but was perhaps also the reason why I didn't get cast....)"

event,"Wheet! The Mirror has shortlisted me for the 10th Dr (along w/ the usual suspects-- Bill Nighty, Eddie Izzard et al)! One can only hope that RTD has shortlisted me as well. Certainly moi over David 'Casanova' Tennant, yeah?"

event,"

Why I Should Be The Tenth Doctor
• Second-generation Doctor Who fan-- understand what the legacy means and how to treat it.
<li>No stranger to controversy, press attention, and long working hours.
<li>Versatile actor who can either posh it up or chav it up, depending on production team desires.
<li>Equally authoritative in a frock coat and a leather jacket.
<li>Sexy beast who appeals to the gay anorak fanbase as well as the frumpy pre-menopausal fanbase.
<li>Can accommodate the production team on the couch, should the need arise.
More details can be found on my CV. (pdf format, Russell darling you do have Acrobat Reader installed, yeah?)"
I was surprised at how much I could look like him, given the application of the right amount of jaw latex....

So, yeah, I was a Geek for the day, and he was a Randyjester. (Won't let me post the photo of him, though, the bastard.) We had some fun w/ it, mostly 'cause we spent the afternoon making fun of each other. (Easy for me to do his voice-- didn't realise that he could do mine!) Nothing earth shattering, really.
Afters, though, hoo boy. (But that's for a separate, more protected entry!)"
event,"No make-up jobs today, although I did help the Geek make some apologetic music. (He is much happier a camper sans cast.) Still, not quite as fun...."
This is fucking scary, isn't it? But it cd v. well be my future....

Mads was aged, too, although aged more than me, so I spent the afternoon referring to her as 'mother' and tending to her every need. Was fun, but also fucking scary to see m'self looking like an older man.
Still, note to Jasper: as much as you say I look better w/ short hair, it's not going to happen unless it absolutely has to for a role. *sticks tongue out at Jasper*"
Although, I really look only about 1/2 Asian. I mean, who'd have thought my chin wd stick out like that?

So, yeah, today I was Asian, more or less. Ditto Mads and two others. After we got all made up, we wandered around pretending to be tourists. Fucking fooled everyone, we did. Even w/ a vid crew attached. It was a hoot. Tomorrow.... age!"

event,"The Quiet Gentleman received a BAFTA nom for best drama serial! WheeT! Also noms for costuming and writing. Nothing for any of the actors, but that's all right, because it truly was an ensemble piece! Cross yer fingers, peeps!"

event,"First, must wish a happy birthday to my Auntie J, who does not look or act like she's sixty-one today. Hope you had a great day, Auntie, and that Uncle Ego wasn't too much of a pain in the arse.
Right. Now. So, what many of you want to know: wot the meeting was like about the next Heyer piece.

Interesting, it was. Only thing really concluded was that Regency Buck will be the next book filuuuuumed. Both the Suits and the Production Team could see me in any of the three main male roles (Pereguine, Bernard, Julian)-- and to tell truth, so can I! So, they're gonna do a casting call, see who turns up, and assign me a part based on who else they have to work w/.
Am fracking chuffed that I have an automatic 'in.'

More interesting: Writer-type (that wd. be AMZ, for those of you keeping score at home) approached me afters, wanting to talk to me about a different project. (He said it wuz a-ok to mention it dans le publique, so it's not like I'm spoiling things.) Repaired to a nearby pub, we did, where he laid the details on me.

Seems that after Regency Buck, he's gonna go for his 1st Series Creation gig. He's already got a spot in fall/winter 2005-6 reserved on 4, on the strength of his scripting of A Quiet Gentleman and The Foundling. He wants me as the lead. Leads, really, 'cause he's thinking the series will involve twins somehow. (Twins, Basil, twins!) Assured him, I did, that I was all about it, if the pilot script was as good as his adaptations are. He anticipates having the script together sometime in June, since he now needs to spew forth more Heyer in the next sev. wks. 'Glad you're interested, Colin,' he said as we parted. 'Couldn't imagine doing it w/o you.'

Am dead chuffed, I am, at that. Never had anyone good want to build a project around me. (Well, other than Saunders and the rest of his Heyer crew-- but that was only after I proved to be both good and good ratings in the first one.) (Less said about that tv-movie-of-the-wk that was s'posed to be a pilot and bombed so badly there's a landmine campaign against its continued existence, the better. My excuse: was in middle of m' macho-shithead-all-drugs-all-the-time phase. Still, Father did say not to sign on the ol' dotted and I blithely ignored him. Stupid, stupid, stupid in retrospect.)

Right. So anyway, spent rest of day hangin' w/ m' homegirl (Shelby, duh!), and now that she's asleep and I've had my nightcap w/ Father, and I'm done here for now, am going off to review scenes for auditions tomorrow. Am keeping bizzy, yay! A bored Colin is a Colin likely to get into trouble."

event,"Gave good voice reel today, I did. Can't talk worth frack currently, though. Hope voice will return enough by tomorrow to argue points of which Heyer Hero I shd be next. Think good thoughts for me tomorrow, darlings, so that I end up in the role you want me to play!
In the meantime, time to have another pot of honeyed-lemon tea before bed."
